metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9775 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack buffer overflow in GfxState.cc in pdftocairo in Poppler before 0.56 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted PDF document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9775` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Alberto Garcia, Francisco Oca, Suleman Ali

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.2').
